mapper.select: SELECT m.mid,m.mname,m.guidegprice,m.gprice,m.mshowImage,g.title,g.gname,g.maxprice,g.minprice,g.gid,g.gimage,m.mtitle FROM db_model m,db_goods g WHERE m.gid=g.gid AND g.gid=#{gid}
select colorName,colorKey,mid from db_color where mid=#{mid}
SELECT b.`bid`,b.`bname`,b.`bphone`,m.`mname`,m.`mid`,g.`gid`,g.`gname` FROM db_model m,db_goods g,db_business b WHERE m.`gid`=g.`gid` AND g.`bid`=b.`bid` AND m.`mid`=#{mid}
